snippet: Evidence shows that DePuy Orthopaedics was aware of a serious problem but failed to alert patients or doctors.
abstract: Editorial questions whether DePuy Orthopaedics, major manufacturer of all-metal hip replacements, was aware of serious problems with device; cites court documents that suggest company failed to alert patients and doctors about problems with product.
lead_paragraph: Evidence shows that DePuy Orthopaedics was aware of a serious problem but failed to alert patients or doctors.

headline.seo: What DePuy Orthopaedics Knew About Its All-Metal Hips
headline.main: What a Company Knew About Its Metal Hips
headline.print_headline: What a Company Knew About Its Metal Hips
